mapper.insert: INSERT into comment (parent_id, recipe_id, writer_id, content) values(#{parentId}, #{recipeId}, #{writerId}, #{content})
mapper.select: select c.id as id, c.parent_id, m.id as writer_id, m.service_id as writer, content, created_at from comment c LEFT JOIN member m on m.id = c.writer_id where recipe_id = #{recipeId}
